DOC.brief_summary: To validate the dosing algorithm for dabigatran etexilate in patients receiving a mechanical heart valve.
DOC.brief_title: Dabigatran Etexilate in Patients With Mechanical Heart Valves
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. Patients aged 1875 2. Patients who have received a bileaflet mechanical heart valve Exclusion criteria: 1. Prior valve surgery 2. Uncontrolled hypertension 3. severe renal impairment 4. active liver disease 5. increased risk of bleeding
